ComicInfo.Title: Truly, Madly, Deadly
ComicInfo.Summary:
Virgil’s relationship with Daisy takes a serious hit while, as Static, he stands alone against six of his most vengeful enemies: Dr. Kilgore, the Swarm, Prometheus, Rubberband Man, the Botanist, and Jump!
The 5th comic before the final issue. Virgil is leading towards the decision of leaving the mantle of Static, but unknown to him his enemies have banded together for a final fight to defeat Static. Will the villians defeat there greatest foe? Will Virgil quit the life of heroism? Read this issue and find out!!!!!!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-21 06:50:12. [CVDB159574]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jeffrey Moore, Julia Lacquement, Steve Mitchell
ComicInfo.Characters: Daisy Watkins, Doctor Kilgore, Frieda Goren, Jump, Prometheus, Rick Stone, Static, The Botanist, The Rubberband Man, The Swarm
